title: What's your CV method?
description: What's your CV method? I observed the oof using k-fold, and found that the increase in the number of folds increases the oof_rmse, but the public LB decreases.  LGBM parmeter(For the fold-12, n_estimators= 1000 learning_rate=0.1 was used as a limited time)   n_estimators=6000,   learning_rate=0.05,   feature_fraction=0.7,   subsample=0.4,   num_leaves=40,   metric='rmse'    All variables are the same.
description_lemmatized: whats cv method observed oof using kfold found increase number fold increase oof_rmse public lb decrease lgbm parmeterfor fold12 n_estimators 1000 learning_rate01 used limited time n_estimators6000 learning_rate005 feature_fraction07 subsample04 num_leaves40 metricrmse variable
